report.title: EBMS Visit Summary list 3
report.description: A list of the number of sites and visits recorded for each species, with filters for user or scheme, this and previous year. Additionally provides the common names in the currently selected language.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists preferred ON o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id = preferred.id JOIN samples p ON o.parent_sample_id = p.id AND p.deleted = false AND p.location_id IS NOT NULL AND p.parent_id IS NULL AND p.survey_id IN (#survey_ids#) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT taxon_meaning_id, string_agg(taxon, ',' ORDER BY id) combined FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists WHERE language_iso = '#language_iso#' AND preferred = false AND taxon_list_id in (#taxon_list_ids#) GROUP BY taxon_meaning_id) common ON common.taxon_meaning_id = o.taxon_meaning_id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND p.survey_id IN (#survey_ids#)

wheres.where: o.date_end >= CAST(extract(YEAR from NOW())||'-01-01' as date)
o.date_end >= CAST((extract(YEAR from NOW())-1)||'-01-01' as date) AND o.date_start <= CAST((extract(YEAR from NOW())-1)||'-12-31' as date)

joins.join: JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON p.location_id = lav.location_id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #country_location_attribute_id# AND lav.int_value = #country_id# AND lav.deleted = false

param.description: The ID of the location_attribute that assigns a location to a country

param.name: country_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the country

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids

param.description: Comma separated list of Taxon list ids
